entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of rain showers or drizzle changing to 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late this evening. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 4:41 PM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High plus 2. POP 30%
